positionName: Taking the Back AKA Back Mount

description.offense: Person attacking takes ther back with seatbelt grip and hooks in, and must retain dominant position and/or go for submission.
description.defense: Person defending must escape from back mount and come up.

description.offense: Person attacking mounts the person defending, and must retain dominant position and/or go for submission
description.defense: Person defending must escape mount, sweep, or submit.

description.offense: Person attacking must transition from knee on belly to a more secure, dominant position, and go for a submission
description.defense: Person defending must prevent the attacker from transitioning, and they themselves must transition to a better position (sweep, mount, take the back, etc)

description.offense: Person attacking secures side control (can either start from transitional side control or 100 kilos), and goes for a submission
description.defense: Person defending must escape side control. Bonus points if they can sweep or go for a submission.

description.offense: Person attacking is trying to pass the defender's open guard.
description.defense: Person defending has the attacker in their open guard, and must transition to a more offensive position and/or hit a submission.

description.offense: Person attacking puts the defending person in their closed guard and must sweep or get the submission
description.defense: Person defending must break the attacking person's guard.

description.offense: Offense's choice - choose a position in which you have the advantage
description.defense: Must defend from whichever position the attacking person chooses

description.offense: Must attack from whichever position the defending person chooses
description.defense: Defense's choice - choose a position in which you have a disadvantage

description.offense: Person attacking has the defending person in their half guard. Can choose which variation of half guard they play. Must transition to a dominant position or get the submission
description.defense: Person defending must break the attacking person's half guard and pass

description.offense: You do you but if you blow your knees out it's not my problem
description.defense: You do you but if you blow your knees out it's not my problem

description.offense: Person attacking is trying to pass the defending person's knee shield.
description.defense: Person defending must prevent the attacker from passing guard, and must go to a more advantageous position (or get a sub)
